title: Anyone ever seen a reds...
body: upvote counter start at one? seems like they always start with 4... and sometimes (rarely) reset to 4....

replies.body: Hi, this is a red comment. It should start at 1 vote, just like everyone else's posts.

I dunno, I see 4...it seems there is a conspiracy afoot.

*puts on investigation hat*
Daen has two upvotes. It's spreading!
I dunno, I see 6. Daen, YOU have 4, not the red.
I knew this was going to happen.
You knew I would have an investigation hat with a propeller?  I'm impressed, I don't tell anyone about it.

I SEE 4 AGAIN.  CONSPIRACY!

*adds more tin foil to investigation hat*
nop nop, it says 3 on my screen. yup yup.

I've been here for at least 9 months. Reds start at 1, just like everyone else. Heck, they can even be *hidden* if they get downvoted far enough. They just tend to get votes faster because they're listed in the red tracker.
I'll keep an eye on that >_>
